title: Really stuck with the name of this font. PLEASE HELP!
content:
Please help need the name of this font for an urgent project.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [GLENDON.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106044414/http:/typophile.com/files/GLENDON.jpg) | 20.91 KB |
author: JamesMaybs

comments.content: Please guys, whoever gets this one is a genius, and will forever be in my debt!
WOW thank you, bang on correct font. What a star you have saved the day! A thousand thank you's Bob
